Game Art Lead: Franziska SchümannGame Art:  Falk Blunck, Kay Seifert, Robin Jünemann, Sophie Nyncke

Game Programming Lead: Christian Katz
Game Programming: Alannah Wächter, Franziska Schümann, Bela Baldwin

Available for Windows & Mac.

If you can, please send us your feedback about your gameplay experience through our Playtesting Feedback Survey. Thank you kindly! :)
